unreleased: BREAKING! **Update**: Changed `bananen.toml` to `bananen.json`

released.name: v0.0.4-alpha
changes: **Update**: Paths on windows are now using a backslash instead of an / before the file.

released.name: v0.0.3-alpha
changes: **Fix**: Fixed help screen that had a wrong example usage of the 'add' command.

released.name: 0.0.3-pre-alpha
changes: **Addition**: Basic functionality for 'add', 'init' and 'regen' was added.
**Addition**: `'dub'` should now also work basically.
**Fix**: `'dub'` no longer accepts empty releases.
**Update**: Every change type now has a color.
